pr_title: [Event Hubs] Canary support for live tests

timeline.message: trying out inset directly with no looping

timeline.bodyText: Can you set this as a param with default value "centraluseuap"
timeline.author: praveenkuttappan
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -73,7 +74,16 @@ jobs:
         value: ${{ parameters.Location }}
 
     strategy:
-      matrix: ${{ parameters.Matrix }}
+      matrix: 
+        ${{ insert }}: ${{ parameters.Matrix }}
+        ${{ if eq(parameters.TestCanary, 'true') }}:          
+          Linux - Java 8 (AzureCloudCanary):            
+            OSVmImage: 'ubuntu-18.04'            
+            JavaTestVersion: '1.8'            
+            DisplayName: 'Linux - Java 8'            
+            SubscriptionConfiguration: $(sub-config-azure-cloud-test-resources-preview)            
+            Location: centraluseuap

timeline.message: add a ResourceGroupLocationCanary for canary location

timeline.bodyText: I would probably add a Java 11 run instead of 8.
timeline.author: weshaggard

replies.bodyText: Thanks. Updated as suggested and triggered the pipeline again.. let me know if that's good.
replies.author: HarshaNalluru

timeline.bodyText: As an aside for Canary should we be using the "-preview" or the "-dogfood" subscription
timeline.author: weshaggard
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -73,7 +75,16 @@ jobs:
         value: ${{ parameters.Location }}
 
     strategy:
-      matrix: ${{ parameters.Matrix }}
+      matrix: 
+        ${{ insert }}: ${{ parameters.Matrix }}
+        ${{ if eq(parameters.TestCanary, 'true') }}:          
+          Linux - Java 11 (AzureCloudCanary):            
+            OSVmImage: 'ubuntu-18.04'
+            JavaTestVersion: '1.11'
+            DisplayName: 'Linux - Java 11'          
+            SubscriptionConfiguration: $(sub-config-azure-cloud-test-resources-preview)

replies.bodyText: @danieljurek suggested '-preview' for special cases like this since we shouldn't disturb the main (normal) subscription with new/more permissions. We haven't talked about '-dogfood' subscription, I'll leave it to you to decide.
replies.author: HarshaNalluru

replies.bodyText: If this is only about enabling preview feature flags then we should be OK with using "-preview".
replies.author: weshaggard
